segments.text: I'm just watching this kitchen quietly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is at the sink, towel in hand, focused on the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet's running, basin full, water spilling over steadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming on the floor, reaching her shoe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, the boy's on a stool by the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching right into the cookie jar with one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks off-balance, leaning back a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl nearby, arm up, waiting expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked on the counter, neat and ready.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window open to the garden, plants and path visible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains pulled back, letting light in nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all so domestic, yet something feels off with the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR
